data.name: Real-time Tactical 2D
data.detailed_description:
Welcome, Commander. We need your help! Earth Republic is again at danger! Defend our positions - this time in 2D!

This Early Access DLC includes one mission and complete DLC product will include 2 levels. Graphical style is different than in base game, since this is 2D styled game. You can access this 2D mission directly and easily from RTS Commander launcher.

More screenshots coming soon!

This DLC is free for you who have bought the base game before DLC:s release day


In order to receive your DLC key, please post your message under the announcement on Community Hub (so we can send key to you privately) or ask it by email.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome, Commander. We need your help! Earth Republic is again at danger! Defend our positions - this time in 2D!

This Early Access DLC includes one mission and complete DLC product will include 2 levels. Graphical style is different than in base game, since this is 2D styled game. You can access this 2D mission directly and easily from RTS Commander launcher.

data.short_description: Play against challenging CPU in this beautiful retro 2D version of RTS Commander!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The game uses OpenGL, it supports version 1.1+, it will run on just about any graphics card produced in 2004 and later. However AI takes processing power so for all times smooth gameplay recommends are on right.
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is possible to play the game by using Steam Controller, but you also need to use mouse in some parts of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 series or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is possible to play the game by using Steam Controller, but you also need to use mouse in some parts of the game.
